title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8450.11 - Public notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8450.11 - Public notice

State Regulations
A notice containing: the job title or name and business
address of the records access officers and fiscal officer; the name, job title, business address and telephone number of the appeal person or persons or body; and the location where records can be seen or copied-shall be posted in a
conspicuous location wherever records are kept and/or published in a local
newspaper of general circulation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
8450.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
